#Generated by VisualGDB project wizard.
#Note: VisualGDB will automatically update this file when you add new sources to the project.

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.20)
project(Linux VERSION 1.0.0)
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 17)
find_package(Threads REQUIRED)
include_directories(${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include/ ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../../lib/DLMS-COSEM/include/ ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../../lib/asio-1.10.6/include/)

set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -D_DEBUG -DASIO_STANDALONE -DASIO_HAS_STD_CHRONO")
set(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} -D_DEBUG -DASIO_STANDALONE -DASIO_HAS_STD_CHRONO")

link_directories(${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../../lib/DLMS-COSEM/Debug/)

add_executable(Linux LinuxScheduler.cpp Linux.cpp LinuxBaseLibrary.cpp LinuxCore.cpp LinuxCOSEMServer.cpp LinuxDebug.cpp LinuxMemory.cpp LinuxSerial.cpp LinuxSimpleTimer.cpp LinuxSocket.cpp LinuxSynchronization.cpp)
target_link_libraries(Linux DLMS-COSEM "${LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES}" "${CMAKE_THREAD_LIBS_INIT}")
